verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I will celebrate. Sing unto the Lord. I will sing to Him a new song. (repeat) I will praise Him. For He has triumphed victoriously. I will sing to Him a new song. (repeat) Hallelujah, hallelujah, hallelujah, hallelujah Hallelu – hallelujah ! (repeat){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Arise, shine – for Your light has come. Arise, shine – for Your light has come. And the glory of the Lord is risen. The glory of the Lord is come. The glory of the Lord is risen upon thee.{/lang-eng}
